message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product for $10,000. This is an exclusive opportunity tailored for someone like you who values quality and performance. Don't miss out on this chance to elevate your experience!
Alice, I appreciate the offer, but $10,000 is a bit outside my budget.  I'm very interested in your product, but I can only go up to $8,500.  Let me know what you think.

Thank you for your interest, Bob. I understand your position, and I'd like to make a counteroffer. Considering your valuation of the product, I am willing to negotiate further. Would $9,000 be within your acceptable range?
